name: Echoes of the void (Black Canvas Interactive)
name_original: Echoes of the void (Black Canvas Interactive)
description:
The void offers many secrets 

Are you gonna be the one to find them? 

Explore a dark and broken world, trying to make your way through remnants of an ancient civilization long forgotten. Use your bow to clear puzzles and destroy hostile crystals trying to block your way.

Credits:

Artists: 

Axel Fält, Beatrice Persson, Durante Auditore, Eddie Cyrillus, Elisabeth lindberg, Johan larsson, Kitt holgersson.

Designers:

Carl Stengård, Edvin Norevik, Jonatan Östlund.

Programmers:

Christoffer Persson, Gustav Bohman, Pontus Westerfors, Robin Lindblad.

Music:

Sebastian Eriksson.
